verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H2363>you.<s%> Come to me quickly! <S%H238>Listen<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice<s%> when I call to <S%H7121>you.<s%>

Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be <S%H3559>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you like <S%H7004>incense;<s%> the lifting <S%H4864>up<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> like the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice.<s%>
<S%H7896>Set<s%> a <S%H8108>watch,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> before my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> <S%H5341>Keep<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

<S%H5186>Don't<s%> incline my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to any <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to practice <S%H5949>deeds<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> with <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H5949>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%> <S%H3898>Don't<s%> let me eat of their <S%H4516>delicacies.<s%>

Let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1986>strike<s%> <S%H2617>me,<s%> it is kindness; let him <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H8081>me,<s%> it is like oil on the <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H7218>don't<s%> let my head <S%H5106>refuse<s%> <S%H8605>it;<s%> Yet my prayer is always against evil <S%H7451>deeds.<s%>
Their <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H8058>thrown<s%> down by the <S%H3027>sides<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock.<s%> They will <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H561>words,<s%> for they are well <S%H5276>spoken.<s%>
"As when one <S%H6398>plows<s%> and <S%H1234>breaks<s%> up the <S%H776>earth,<s%> our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6340>scattered<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>"
For my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on <S%H136>you,<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H136>Lord.<s%> In <S%H2620>you,<s%> I take refuge. <S%H6168>Don't<s%> leave my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6168>destitute.<s%>
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me from the <S%H3027>snare<s%> which they have <S%H3369>laid<s%> for <S%H4170>me,<s%> from the traps of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> together into their own <S%H4364>nets,<s%> <S%H3162>while<s%> I pass <S%H5674>by.<s%>
